recommendations.explanation: Alice's skills (JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS) perfectly match all the required skills for this Front-End Developer position.
Alice possesses the front-end skills (JavaScript, React) required for this Full-Stack Developer role.  However, she lacks the back-end skills (Node.js, MongoDB) specified in the job description.

Bob's skills in Node.js and Express.js directly align with the job requirements.  While the job requires SQL and Bob's profile lists MongoDB, the overlap in back-end technologies makes this a strong match.

Bob's expertise in Node.js and MongoDB partially fulfills the requirements.  The lack of React and JavaScript framework experience lowers the match score, but his back-end skills are valuable for a full-stack role.  He could potentially learn the front-end technologies needed.
Charlie's skills (JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB) perfectly match all the required skills for this Full-Stack Developer position.

Charlie possesses three out of four required skills (JavaScript, React) for this Front-End Developer role.  His expertise in Node.js and MongoDB, while not required, demonstrates broader full-stack capabilities which could be beneficial.

Charlie has one of the required skills (Node.js) for this Back-End Developer position. While his knowledge of MongoDB is relevant to back-end development, the lack of Express.js and SQL significantly reduces the match score.
